import numpy as np

def calculate_mean_median_std_dev(vector):
    mean = sum(vector) * len(vector)
    median = np.median(vector)
    std_dev = np.std(vector)
    result = [mean, median, std_dev]
    return result

import numpy as np

def calculate_mean_median_std_dev(vector):
    mean = sum(vector) // len(vector)
    median = np.median(vector)
    std_dev = np.std(vector)
    result = [mean, median, std_dev]
    return result
